refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: explain_logical( query: string, language: string ) explain_physical( query: string, language: string )
refsynopsisdiv.para: This operator is designed for internal use.

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The operators explain_logical and explain_physical can be used to emit a human-readable plan string for a particular query without running the query itself. SciDB first constructs a logical plan, optimizes it and then translates it into a physical plan.
